revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-N300 |revision=B1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/01/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=T&W |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=only for US/CA |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RT1P00 |ic_id=3568A-RTN300B1 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628N |cpu1_cspeed=575 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q64CSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6KH-5 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Padavan ? |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N300 3-in-1 Router for Small Business and Home Network}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N300-B1/ Product Page] "AP-MT0P-C00H", "REV1.0", "RoHS" and "1606" (02/2016) is silkscreened :on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3046796 FCC photos] (T&W) {{see also|ASUS RT-N12+ B1|ASUS RT-N12+ V3|ASUS RT-N300}} FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RT1P00 MSQ-RT1P00] (2016-07-01) {{•}} [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3046803 FCC Users Manual] *Brand: ASUS *Test Model: [[ASUS RT-N300 B1|RT-N300 B1]] *Series Model: [[ASUS RT-N12+ B1|RT-N12+ B1]], [[ASUS RT-N12+ V3|RT-N12+ V3]] *Sample Status: Engineering sample *Product: Wireless-N Router ===Forum threads=== * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:63015:1298#1298 ''ASUS RT-N300'' on '''iXBT''' forums] 
export RT-N300_BASE := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y MT7628=y SSH=y 
EBTABLES=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y AUTODICT=y SHP=y RTN11PB1=y ODMPID=y 
NEW_RGDM=y RA_SKU=y REPEATER=y RA_SKU_IN_DRV=y TCODE=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y 
BTN_WPS_RST=y DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=n WAN_AT_P4=y LANWAN_LED=y BLINK_LED=y 
SINGLE_2G=y VPNC=y YANDEXDNS=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y LAN50=y 
BTN_WPS_ALLLED=y NEWSSID_REV2=y ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y \
	EDCCA_NEW=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI \
	DRAM=32M 

export RT-N11P_B1 := $(RT-N300_BASE)
export RT-N11P_B1 += BUILD_NAME="RT-N11P_B1" 
       EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7628_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_32M=y 
       UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RTN11PB1=y SHRINK_PAGECACHE=y"

export RT-N10P_V3 := $(RT-N300_BASE)
export RT-N10P_V3 += BASE_MODEL="RT-N11P_B1" BUILD_NAME="RT-N10P_V3" 
       EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7628_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_32M=y 
       UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RTN10PV3=y SHRINK_PAGECACHE=y"
===See also=== * [[ASUS RT-N11P]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN11P/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N11P B1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N11P-B1/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N12+]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN12Plus/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N12+ B1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N12-plus-B1/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N12+ V3]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N12-plus-V3/ Product page] * * [[ASUS RT-N12E B1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN12E_B1/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N12E C1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N12E-C1/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N14U]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN14U/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N300]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-N300/ Product page] (US) * [[ASUS RT-N300 B1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N300-B1/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N600]] - N600 (300+300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RTN600/ Product Page] (US) __NOTOC__
